name: Esoteric and Occult Language Decoding
description: Unraveling the hidden meanings behind esoteric languages, numerology, sigil magic, and elite coding systems.

cards.title: Numerology and Kabbalistic Encoding
cards.description: Understanding the numerical patterns used by IDC factions to structure reality manipulation.
bulletpoints: Decoding gematria and the power of numbers in elite symbolism.
Understanding how date calculations influence mass rituals.
Analyzing elite numerology in financial markets, political events, and corporate branding.

cards.title: Sigils, Glyphs, and Logos
cards.description: Identifying the hidden use of sigil magic in corporate, governmental, and esoteric symbolism.
bulletpoints: Breaking down how sigils act as subconscious command mechanisms.
Understanding the energetic imprinting of symbols on collective psychology.
Tracing sigil-based manipulation from ancient esoteric orders to modern-day brands.

cards.title: Elite Ciphers and Hidden Languages
cards.description: Deconstructing the secret coding systems used by IDC networks to communicate hidden messages.
bulletpoints: Identifying patterns in Masonic, Jesuit, and occult documents.
Understanding linguistic manipulation through hidden acronyms and abbreviations.
Decrypting modern elite communication channels, including predictive programming in entertainment.
